p: 5 week old grape seedlings cv. Gutedel are treated with the formulated test compound (0.02 % active substance) in a spray chamber. One day after application grape plants are inoculated by spraying a sporangia suspension (4 x 10 4 sporangia/ml) on the lower leaf side of the test plants. After an incubation period of 6 days at +22°C and 95% r. h. in a greenhouse the disease incidence is assessed.
